message.body: Hey love! My friend Sofie wants to participate in open mics and needs a friend to go with and she specifically asked about you! Would you text her if I gave you her number
Awesome!! I'll text her before Tuesday :)
￼Two of our favorite sounding boys are rocking out some Tom Petty right now. Wish you were here!
Ugh sending my biggest love. I'm in new Hampshire....? Yep. Miss you like crazy. Say hi for me!
Yell it in a weird way during their applause
Done. No one knew what was happening :)
